sentences.sContent: This does not prevent disease altogether, but can reduce its severity.
sentences.sContent_eng: This does not prevent disease altogether, but can reduce its severity.
sentences.sCn: 这虽然不能完全防止疾病，但能减少它的严重性。

sentences.sContent: Also, the severity of the impact of each of these challenges on software platforms may vary from one organization to another.
sentences.sContent_eng: Also, the severity of the impact of each of these challenges on software platforms may vary from one organization to another.
sentences.sCn: 另外，根据组织的不同，这里每一项挑战对于软件平台影响的严重性可能有所差异。

sentences.sContent: Within this dialog, you can change the severity rating of the selected rule, along with any other parameters that it defines.
sentences.sContent_eng: Within this dialog, you can change the severity rating of the selected rule, along with any other parameters that it defines.
sentences.sCn: 在这个对话框内部，您能够改变被选中规则的严重性等级，以及其他任何参数。

words.tran: 严峻的；严厉的；剧烈的；苛刻的
严重地；严格地，严厉地；纯朴地
